name: The Sims 3
description: Install Sims 3 DVD-Version, requires real DVD
notes: Please check the installation path is "c:\Program Files\Electronic Arts\The Sims 3\" if you have the multilang version the last folder change for you localization, for example "Los Sims 3" for spanish countries, "Leis Sims 3" for french countries and lancher not work.

files.file1: N/A:Please select the Sims 3 setup file

task.description: Setting version to xp for Sims3LauncherW...
task.name: set_regedit

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Sims 3 setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Electronic Arts/The Sims 3/Game/Bin/TS3.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet20
    arch: win32
    description: Installing .Net 2.0
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: mfc42
    arch: win32
    description: Installing MFC42
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Setting version to xp for Sims3LauncherW...
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\AppDefaults\Sims3LauncherW.exe
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: winxp
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Setting version to 7 for default...
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: win7
- task:
    executable: file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  restore_gamma: true
wine:
  UseXVidMode: true
  esync: true
  version: tkg-oldnvidia-sims3-4.1-x86_64
